projects.projectname: Building a Text-Based Bank in Java
projects.description: Bank Management system using concepts of java.I have used basic data structure concepts like Arrays and object oriented programming and build a Bank management system.Admin Can create and update a bank account and user can fetch the data of his bank account

A software designed for a car showroom to manage a detailed database of it’s customers and employees. (using JAVA, MYSQL). There is a category of Admin and Employees . A admin can add a new employee and also can fetch the data of the employee as well as he can alter the data of the employees if it is necessay. And there is another category employee who can only fetch his own data and can change his data like username ,password,address etc. Both admin and employee can add,delete and alter the details of each customer who are visiting the showroom.

A Database management system. In which we can manage data of a website. A grocery website where people purchase items and we have to manage all the details of customers as well as employees, like add/delete/update customers.
